The Layers of the Urban Environment - Mapzen Vector Tiles & D3

January 18, 2017

How can we create lightweight digital maps that can be easily and rapidly modified to display new data? A little exploration of mine in digital map creation through the use of Mapzen Vector Tiles and D3.js.

Continue reading

Conquering Symmetry with Prodirect Manipulation

October 12, 2016

The world of graphical development has historically been split between two camps: most applications either use a programmatic or direct paradigm for graphical manipulation. Could a hybrid of these two methods result in graphical tools that can be both easier and quicker to use? Let’s explore the benefits of a ‘prodirect’ style of graphical development with the Sketch-n-Sketch tool.

Continue reading

Further Avenues in Prodirect Manipulation

October 5, 2016

The original target medium of the Sketch-n-Sketch tool was SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics). However, the paradigm of prodirect manipulation has the potential across a broad spectrum of graphical software including data visualization, web and UI design, document preparation systems, and even 3D digital fabrication design.
